long_description: This simple-to-use optional Katadyn carbon cartridge reduces chemicals and bad taste from water. Replaceable activated-carbon cartridge removes chemicals such as chlorine, leaving water tasting fresh and clean. May be used with all brands of water systems. Attaches to 0.25-in. inlet and outlet hoses. Includes 1 cartridge and 2 packets of carbon; each packet of carbon treats up to 50 gal.
short_description: This simple-to-use optional Katadyn carbon cartridge reduces chemicals and bad taste from water.
